channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Navigating Troubled Waters: What the Surge in Bankruptcy Filings Means for the Economy

item.description: Congressional Republicans are divided over how to proceed with massive conservative policy overhauls next year.

item.title: How DOGE Can Tackle The National Debt By Returning To Constitutional Spending
item.description: DOGE should begin by proposing to eliminate funding that furthers only local rather than truly national interests.

item.description: Don't believe reports of increase deaths due to violence against transgender Americans driven by Republican anti-trans laws and rhetoric.

item.description: Any time a leftist politician starts a letter with 'Dear White People' there's a good chance that whatever is said will be steeped in hatred.

item.title: Few Americans approve of Biden's Hunter pardon
item.description: Only a small number of Americans, 2 in 10, approve of President Biden's decision to pardon his son, Hunter Biden.

item.title: 'DeSanta Claus' strikes again: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis announces extra days off for state workers
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis announced additional days off for state workers in December 2024, lending credence to the nickname "DeSanta Claus."

item.title: Congress Is Ramming Through A $895 Billion Pork-Filled Defense Bill Before Trump Takes Office
